downloadTitle: Microsoft Dynamics GP 2013 Tools Documentation: Resource Descriptions
downloadDescription: This help file describes the Resource Descriptions tool that helps you find technical information about Dexterity-based applications.
detailsSection: You can use this page to download the Resource Descriptions help (Resdesc.chm), which describes the Resource Descriptions tool information in HTML Help format. The help is in .chm file format.
systemRequirementsSection: • You must be using Microsoft Dynamics GP 2013
installInstructionSection:
1. Click Download to download the help file.
  2. Save the file to your computer.
  3. We recommend that you save it to the appropriate folder in your Microsoft Dynamics GP 2013 installation folder, so you can access the updated help from within the product.

relatedResourcesSection.title: microsoft Dynamics GP Developer Center on MSDN
